trans-unit.note: This button starts the process of downloading and installing updates for the app.

trans-unit.source: A mandatory update is available for your app. Update now to continue using it.
trans-unit.target: 必須のアップデートがあります。アプリを使い続けるにはいますぐアップデートしてください。
trans-unit.note: Message informing users that they have to update the app in order to continue using it.

trans-unit.target: アップデートの準備ができています
trans-unit.note: Title of the mandatory update available message being shown.
This button launches the Windows Settings app to the page that helps users connect to the Internet.

trans-unit.source: The app can't open because you are not connected to the internet. Make sure Wi-Fi is on and try again.
trans-unit.target: インターネットに接続していないため、アプリを開くことができません。 Wi-Fiがオンになっていることを確認して、もう一度お試しください。
trans-unit.note: Message informing users that they have to connect to the internet in order to continue using the app.

trans-unit.target: 接続を確認してください
trans-unit.note: Title of the no internet connection message being shown.
This button refreshes the web page potentially after the user connected to the Internet.

trans-unit.source: The update was unable to complete. Please try again later by restarting the app or via the Store.
trans-unit.target: 更新を完了できませんでした。アプリを再起動するか、ストアから再試行してください。
trans-unit.note: Message informing users that the app failed to update and that they have a couple of options.

trans-unit.source: Downloading and installing updates. Please don't close the app. This should only take a few minutes.
trans-unit.target: アップデートをダウンロードとインストールしています。アプリを閉じないでください。これには数分しかかかりません。
trans-unit.note: Message informing users that the app is currently updating and should finish shortly.

trans-unit.target: Microsoftストアからアップデートする
trans-unit.note: When updates fail to install, this button is shown to launch the Microsoft Store and retry the update.

trans-unit.target: あとでもう一度お試しください
trans-unit.note: When updates fail to install, this button is shown for the user to acknowledge that they can try to install the update later from the app. Once clicked, the app will close.
Button that will close the dialog and allow the user to continue using the app for now.

trans-unit.source: We no longer support this version of the app, please install the latest to continue using it. The app will automatically update next time it is started. You may experience bugs until the next version is installed.
trans-unit.target: We no longer support this version of the app, please install the latest to continue using it. The app will automatically update next time it is started. You may experience bugs until the next version is installed.
trans-unit.note: Primary message of the dialog shown when a mandatory update is available.
Button on the dialog that will switch the app page to that of installing mandatory updates.

trans-unit.source: Sorry to interrupt, please update this app
trans-unit.target: Sorry to interrupt, please update this app
trans-unit.note: Title of a dialog shown when apps are started for which a mandatory update is available.
